caseStudies.title: See how Illia fills household roles in Medellín & Floripa
caseStudies.subtitle: Three real briefs our concierge team closed in under 48 hours.

family.headline: Family of four in El Poblado
family.context: New arrivals with two kids needed a live-in housekeeper comfortable with school runs and meal prep.
matches: Introduced Ana (7 years experience with bilingual families)
Suggested Luisa for backup weekend support
Arranged two trial days and secured onboarding paperwork
family.result: Hired Ana within 36 hours. Family kept Luisa on rota for weekends and holidays.

remote.headline: Remote couple in Laureles
remote.context: Needed weekly deep cleaning and bilingual dog walker that could handle a reactive rescue pup.
matches: Curated cleaning duo with pet-handling references
Booked dog walker with certified positive training background
Coordinated key handoff and recurring subscription
remote.result: Household now runs on a Tuesday cleaning + Friday dog adventure schedule managed via Illia reminders.

founder.headline: Startup founder landing in Floripa
founder.context: Wanted a chef for healthy lunches and a part-time nanny fluent in Portuguese & English.
matches: Lined up chef Daniela with plant-based menu planning
Matched nanny Júlia with Montessori background
Shared payroll templates compliant with Brazil domestic worker law
founder.result: Signed both providers in 5 days with Illia concierge handling contracts and onboarding.
